content: Primary language: Python 3.11+. Key frameworks: FastAPI, Pydantic, MCP, structlog, httpx.
Entry point: src/delia/cli.py with subcommands (serve, api, chat, index, init-project).
Data directory: DELIA_DATA_DIR env var > project/data/ > ~/.delia/data/.
TUI is separate Node.js app in tui/ directory using TypeScript/React.
